subject: Cancellation of order
description_text:
Hi,

Really sorry to have to write this email but I bought 2 products from your
website a couple hours ago and after some reconsideration I would like to
cancel the 2 orders if that is possible. Please let me know what
information I need to provide to make this happen as soon as possible since
I would not like for you too already have the package sent. The 2 order
numbers are #SSN2876 and #SSN2875

Again really sorry for this its nothing with the product or anything from
your part its just me realising that I do not need them at this moment in
time.

Hope you have a wonderful day,
Robert Cristian Ancuta

conversations.body_text: Hi SJ,    We apologize for the delayed responseâ€”we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has already been shipped and cannot be canceled. We will attempt to intercept the package for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045960117895,SF6045960119160
Hi SJ,    We have intercepted your package and will cancel it for you. Please don't worry.
